divs: Sighting Details Whilst driving ,my mother and i spotted to lightsas described above.They were flying in a se direction to a ne direction.Theyflew overhead and paused over tunstall hill,in which they did a series ofidentical manovers, right angle turns ,abrubt stops,flashing on and off,etc.theywere also reported to a radio station
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Sunderland
